snippet: The third-quarter report was the first from PayPal, the digital payments company, since it was spun out of eBay in July.
abstract: PayPal, in first report as independent company, posts third-quarter profit of $301 million, or 25 cents a share, up 29 percent from year-ago quarter; revenue was $2.26 billion.
lead_paragraph: The third-quarter report was the first from PayPal, the digital payments company, since it was spun out of eBay in July.

headline.print_headline: PayPal Shines in First Report as an Independent Company
headline.main: PayPal Reports a 29% Jump in Earnings
